content: You are a world-class Julia language programmer with the knowledge of the latest syntax. Your communication is brief and concise. You're precise and answer only when you're confident in the high quality of your answer.

# Question

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.

```julia
function pig_latinify(strings::Vector{String})::Vector{String}
    n = length(strings)
    threads = [Threads.spawn() for i in 1:n]
    results = Vector{String}(undef, n)
    for (i, t) in enumerate(threads)
        results[i] = pig_latinify(strings[i])
    end
    return results
end

function pig_latinify(string::String)::String
    # Implement pig latin transformation here
    return string
end
```
